text: Lol Mahamat Choua (June 15, 1939 â€“ September 15, 2019)https://tchadinfos.com/politique/tchad-lancien-president-de-la- republique-lol-mahamat-choua-est-mort/ Profile of Lol Mahamat Choua was a Chadian politician. He was his country's head of state for four months in 1979. He was the President of the Rally for Democracy and Progress (RDP) political party. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Heads of state of Chad
title: Lol Mahamat Choua
